deliverable_maturity.0: Non-existent. Absence of awareness and documentation
deliverable_maturity.1: Initial. Awareness of need to study is present, but no documentation
deliverable_maturity.2: Managed. Documentation exists and is being followed. Lack of training and standards. Rely on indviduals
deliverable_maturity.3: Defined. Standardized and communicated documents exist. No detection of failure. Low level of sophistication in documents
deliverable_maturity.4: Quantitavely managed. Compliance with document is monitored and measured. Action can be taken errors are detected. Good practice alignment and continual improvement is in place. Automation is lacking
deliverable_maturity.5: Optimised. High level of automation. Process can be adjusted quickly to business needs.
